column4: I'm trying to mount a MAC OS X external drive to ubuntu but im getting a wrong fs type or bad option error
I know the drive is good.
im using the command sudo mount -t hfsplus /dev/sdb2 /media/MacDrive/
[ 1157.194655] hfs: unable to find HFS+ superblock
how would i give it more imformation?
its my mac backup disk with all my data
i dont have a mac anymore thoguh
